name: KazColorFramework
summary: A comprehensive framework for color manipulation and conversion in Swift.
description:
KazColorFramework provides a rich set of utilities for working with colors in Swift. 
It supports conversions between various color formats (RGB, HEX, HSL, etc.), 
offers color mixing capabilities, and includes functions for creating custom colors 
based on user-defined parameters like hue, saturation, brightness, or color names. 
It also features a collection of color effects and filters, including blur, 
brightness adjustment, contrast adjustment, and more.
